body:
I've just updated the make script to mount ramfs on /tmp,
before launching the buildlet.

The runtime test is a bit faster when run in ramfs:

```
cpu% go test runtime -short -timeout 240s
ok  	runtime	91.710s
```

I'd to update the Plan 9 CD image to fix ramfs. I took that
opportunity to include the amd64 binaries and 9k kernel,
so the CD image is now a bit larger (91MB to 116MB).
